entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
